column4: I use BitTornado with Feisty beta.... 4 torrents at one time, 50kB upload max per file, no additional lag on my other computer running WoW, no skyrocketing pings. I prefer BitTornado over all the other clients I have used.
Yes, it's nice, but it seems to slow down your gnome-environment a lot, if you have multiple downloads.
You are SOOO right, I leave that comp alone when I am torrenting. I am fortunate enough to have a couple comps sitting there. Torrents on one, WoW on the other.
Hehe, I just have an old 266mhz-laptop here, so there's no "letting my main-computer do the download"... ;-)
